         'security.W017',  # Check CSRF cookie http only

body_text: Since this is controllable via envvars, it should also be in Base, so it is available to all environments. It should also be in the documentation.
body: Since this is controllable via envvars, it should also be in `Base`, so it is available to all environments. It should also be in the documentation.
body_html: Since this is controllable via envvars, it should also be in Base, so it is available to all environments. It should also be in the documentation.
